alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hall; Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 2:58AM CST until January 24 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle, light freezing rain and freezing fog expected. Total ice accumulations from a glaze to a couple hundredths of an inch are expected. * WHERE...Buffalo, Hall, Harlan, and Phelps Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
